```{r , echo=true}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)

df <- tibble(
 X=rnorm(mean=0, sd=1, n=1000),
 Y=rnorm(mean=1, sd=2, n=1000),
 sum_indicator=ifelse( X + Y > 0.5,"True","False")
) 


df$'x + y > 0.5' <-recode(df$sum_indicator, `True`="Yes", `False`="No")

df$'x + y > 0.5' <-as.factor(df$'x + y > 0.5')

mutate(df$sum_indicator<-recode(df$sum_indicator, `True`="Yes",`False`="No"))

df$`x + y > 0.5` <- fct_relevel( df$`x + y > 0.5`, c("Yes","No") )
str(df)

ggplot(df, aes(x = X , y = Y)) +
geom_point(aes(color=`x + y > 0.5`)) +
scale_color_manual(values = c("orange", "blue")) +  
ggtitle( "Independent Bivariate Normal Random Variables" ) +
xlab( " X ~ N (0,1) " ) + 
ylab( " Y ~ N (1,2) " )

```
